_header: In this time a child was born
Note: Burden same as 2641; for a variant see 5700.
Subjects: Christ, songs in honour of; carols, Nativity
_description: A song of the six festivals in honor of Christ: Nativity, Circumcision, etc. — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ’Man be glad in halle & bour / This tyme was born our sauyour’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
In this tyme a chylod was bornTo saue tho sowle þat wern
                    forlorn…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Ihesu bryng vs to þat endeWithoutyn delay our
                    sauyour
